concept.title: Release 11.0.1
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.0.1 includes the following new features.

ul.li: Android Enterprise support This allows for the use of Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) capable of managing Android Enterprise profiles, such as Google MaaS360 or MobileIron.
Updated Navigation Drawer with improved UI and performance.
Improved Login flow with community setting validation.

App Configuration using an EMM Provider HCL Sametime for Android supports managed configuration via the most common Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) providers. See Configuring HCL Sametime for Android via a EMM Provider for more information.
